m:MaterialRow.demo:PrettyPre:
<!-- Addin Import -->
xmlns:ma="urn:import:gwt.material.design.addins.client"
<!-- Addin Usage -->
<ma:splitpanel.MaterialSplitPanel height="500px">
<m:MaterialPanel grid="l6 m6 s6" padding="0" backgroundColor="GREY_LIGHTEN_2">
<m:MaterialTitle textAlign="CENTER" title="Left Zone" description="Content must be added here"/>
</m:MaterialPanel>
<m:MaterialPanel grid="l6 m6 s6" padding="0" backgroundColor="GREY_LIGHTEN_3">
<m:MaterialTitle textAlign="CENTER" title="Right Zone" description="Content must be added here"/>
</m:MaterialPanel>
</ma:splitpanel.MaterialSplitPanel>

m:MaterialTitle.title: Introduction
m:MaterialTitle.description: Using MaterialSplitPanel you must require to wrap two columns inside for the splitting feature.

m:MaterialRow.demo:PrettyPre:
<m.addins:MaterialSplitPanel backgroundColor="BLACK" height="500px">
<m:MaterialPanel grid="l6 m6 s6" padding="0" backgroundColor="GREY_LIGHTEN_2">
<m:MaterialTitle textAlign="CENTER" title="Left Zone" description="Content must be added here"/>
</m:MaterialPanel>
<m:MaterialPanel grid="l6 m6 s6" padding="0" backgroundColor="GREY_LIGHTEN_3">
<m:MaterialTitle textAlign="CENTER" title="Right Zone" description="Content must be added here"/>
</m:MaterialPanel>
</m.addins:MaterialSplitPanel>

m:MaterialTitle.title: Styling
m:MaterialTitle.description: You can style the splitter bar easily.

m:MaterialRow.demo:PrettyPre:
<m.addins:MaterialSplitPanel backgroundColor="BLUE" height="500px">
<m:MaterialPanel backgroundColor="BLUE_LIGHTEN_2">
<m:MaterialTitle textAlign="CENTER" title="Left Zone" description="Content must be added here"/>
</m:MaterialPanel>
<m:MaterialPanel backgroundColor="BLUE_LIGHTEN_3">
<m:MaterialTitle textAlign="CENTER" title="Right Zone" description="Content must be added here"/>
</m:MaterialPanel>
</m.addins:MaterialSplitPanel>

m:MaterialTitle.title: Thickness
m:MaterialTitle.description: You can easily set the thickness of your split bar by adding thickness='12'

m:MaterialTitle.title: Horizontal Thichness
m:MaterialTitle.description: You can also set the horizontal bar thickness of your split panel.

m:MaterialRow.demo:PrettyPre:
<m.addins:MaterialSplitPanel backgroundColor="BLUE" thickness="12" height="500px">
<m:MaterialPanel backgroundColor="BLUE_LIGHTEN_2">
<m:MaterialTitle textAlign="CENTER" title="Left Zone" description="Content must be added here"/>
</m:MaterialPanel>
<m:MaterialPanel backgroundColor="BLUE_LIGHTEN_3">
<m:MaterialTitle textAlign="CENTER" title="Right Zone" description="Content must be added here"/>
</m:MaterialPanel>
</m.addins:MaterialSplitPanel>

m:MaterialTitle.title: Vertical Splitter
m:MaterialTitle.description: You can set the axis / orientation of your splitter by addins splitter='Axis.VERTICAL'

m:MaterialRow.demo:PrettyPre:
<m.addins:MaterialSplitPanel axis="VERTICAL" height="500px">
<m:MaterialPanel backgroundColor="GREY_LIGHTEN_2">
<m:MaterialTitle textAlign="CENTER" title="Top Zone" description="Content must be added here"/>
</m:MaterialPanel>
<m:MaterialPanel backgroundColor="GREY_LIGHTEN_3">
<m:MaterialTitle textAlign="CENTER" title="Bottom Zone" description="Content must be added here"/>
</m:MaterialPanel>
</m.addins:MaterialSplitPanel>

m:MaterialTitle.title: Dock
m:MaterialTitle.description: Splitter Dock is the white line inside the splitter bar. When clicking into it, the splitter will collapse depends on Docking position (LEFT By Default for Horizontal Axis and TOP by Default for Vertical Axis)

m:MaterialRow.demo:PrettyPre:
<m.addins:MaterialSplitPanel backgroundColor="BLACK" dock="RIGHT" height="500px">
<!-- Content goes here -->
</m.addins:MaterialSplitPanel>

m:MaterialTitle.title: Left/Right Min/Max for Horizontal Axis
m:MaterialTitle.description: You can set the minimu / mmaximum splitter area on each child component

m:MaterialRow.demo:PrettyPre:
<m.addins:MaterialSplitPanel leftMin="100" leftMax="400" rightMin="100" rightMax="300" backgroundColor="BLACK" dock="RIGHT" height="500px">
<m:MaterialPanel backgroundColor="GREY_LIGHTEN_2">
<m:MaterialTitle textAlign="CENTER" title="Left Zone" description="Min: 100 and Max: 400"/>
</m:MaterialPanel>
<m:MaterialPanel backgroundColor="GREY_LIGHTEN_3">
<m:MaterialTitle textAlign="CENTER" title="Right Zone" description="Min: 100 and Max: 300"/>
</m:MaterialPanel>
</m.addins:MaterialSplitPanel>

m:MaterialTitle.title: Top/Bottom Min/Max for Vertical Axis
m:MaterialTitle.description: You can set the minimum / maximum splitter area on each child component

m:MaterialRow.demo:PrettyPre:
<m.addins:MaterialSplitPanel topMin="100" topMax="400" bottomMin="100" bottomMax="300" backgroundColor="BLACK" axis="VERTICAL" height="500px">
<m:MaterialPanel backgroundColor="GREY_LIGHTEN_2">
<m:MaterialTitle textAlign="CENTER" title="Top Zone" description="Min: 100 and Max: 400"/>
</m:MaterialPanel>
<m:MaterialPanel backgroundColor="GREY_LIGHTEN_3">
<m:MaterialTitle textAlign="CENTER" title="Bottom Zone" description="Min: 100 and Max: 300"/>
</m:MaterialPanel>
</m.addins:MaterialSplitPanel>

m:MaterialTitle.title: Bar Position
m:MaterialTitle.description: Bar Position accepts a percentage where the split bar will be (By default it's 50 means it's in the middle)

m:MaterialRow.demo:PrettyPre:
<m.addins:MaterialSplitPanel barPosition="10" backgroundColor="BLACK" height="500px">
<m:MaterialPanel backgroundColor="GREY_LIGHTEN_2">
<m:MaterialTitle textAlign="CENTER" title="Left Zone" description="Bar position at 10%"/>
</m:MaterialPanel>
<m:MaterialPanel backgroundColor="GREY_LIGHTEN_3">
<m:MaterialTitle textAlign="CENTER" title="Right Zone" description="Bar position at 10%"/>
</m:MaterialPanel>
</m.addins:MaterialSplitPanel>

m:MaterialTitle.title: Advance Splitting
m:MaterialTitle.description: You can split any divs easily just like the core gwt split layout panel but with more control

m:MaterialRow.demo:PrettyPre:
<m.addins:MaterialSplitPanel dock="BOTTOM" barPosition="80" axis="VERTICAL" backgroundColor="BLACK" height="500px">
<m.addins:MaterialSplitPanel barPosition="20" backgroundColor="BLACK" height="500px">
<m:MaterialPanel backgroundColor="GREY_LIGHTEN_2">
<m:MaterialTitle textAlign="CENTER" title="1"/>
</m:MaterialPanel>
<m.addins:MaterialSplitPanel dock="RIGHT" barPosition="80" backgroundColor="BLACK">
<m:MaterialPanel backgroundColor="GREY_LIGHTEN_2">
<m:MaterialTitle textAlign="CENTER" title="2"/>
</m:MaterialPanel>
<m:MaterialPanel backgroundColor="GREY_LIGHTEN_2">
<m:MaterialTitle textAlign="CENTER" title="3"/>
</m:MaterialPanel>
</m.addins:MaterialSplitPanel>
</m.addins:MaterialSplitPanel>
<m:MaterialPanel backgroundColor="GREY_LIGHTEN_2">
<m:MaterialTitle textAlign="CENTER" title="4"/>
</m:MaterialPanel>
</m.addins:MaterialSplitPanel>
